Container.Name: cryptomator-webdav
Container.Overview: Cryptomator WebDAV allows you to serve a locally stored Cryptomator vault over WebDAV, allowing access through third party WebDav tools such as rclone, Mountain Duck, CyberDuck etc. See the Cryptomator WebDAV github project at https://github.com/greycubesgav/cryptomator-webdav More details about Cryptomator can be found at https://cryptomator.org

Config.Name: Cryptomator webDAV Port
Config.Description: Port the Cryptomator WebDAV share will be available at.

Config.Name: Cryptomator Vault
Config.Description: The location of the local Cryptomator vault files.

Config.Name: Cryptomator Vault Password
Config.Description: The Cryptomator password for the vault.
